caption.p: Chemical structures of seven standard compounds. (a) 2,3,4′,5-tetrahydroxystilbene 2- O- β-D-glucopyranoside. (b) Physcionin. (c) Emodin 8-glucoside. (d) Emodin. (e) 6-hydroxymusizin 8- O- α-D-apiofuranapiofuranosyl-(1-->6)- β-D-glucopyranoside. (f) Pleuropyrone A. (g) Torachrysone 8- O- β-D-glucopyranoside.
